issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 21): `android.Manifest.permission#FOREGROUND_SERVICE`
Field requires API level 33 (current min is 21): `android.Manifest.permission#POST_NOTIFICATIONS`
Field requires API level 23 (current min is 21): `android.provider.Settings#ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS`
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 21): `android.Manifest.permission#FOREGROUND_SERVICE`
Field requires API level 30 (current min is 29): `android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_MICROPHONE`
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
Found dynamic locale changes, but did not find corresponding Play Core library calls for downloading languages and splitting by language is not disabled in the `bundle` configuration

Use of `REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS` violates the Play Store Content Policy regarding acceptable use cases, as described in https://developer.android.com/training/monitoring-device-state/doze-standby.html
`noiseReceiver` is missing `RECEIVER_EXPORTED` or `RECEIVER_NOT_EXPORTED` flag for unprotected broadcasts registered for com.app.noiselevelmonitor.NOISE_UPDATE
A newer version of `compileSdkVersion` than 34 is available: 35
A newer version of androidx.appcompat:appcompat than 1.6.1 is available: 1.7.0
A newer version of androidx.core:core than 1.9.0 is available: 1.15.0
A newer version of androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout than 2.1.4 is available: 2.2.1
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.11.0 is available: 1.12.0
Format string '`error_service_start`' is not a valid format string so it should not be passed to `String.format`

<string name="noise_reference_content">Typical dB levels:

• 0-10: Barely audible
• 20-30: Whisper, quiet room
• 40-50: Normal conversation
• 60-70: Busy office, traffic
• 80-90: Hairdryer, noisy factory
• 100-110: Power tools, loud music
• 120+: Painful, hearing damage risk</string>

issue.message: It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
Very long vector path (910 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.

<string name="noise_reference_content">Типові рівні шуму:

• 0-10: Ледь чутно
• 20-30: Шепіт, тиха кімната
• 40-50: Звичайна розмова
• 60-70: Офіс, дорожній рух
• 80-90: Фен, шумний цех
• 100-110: Електроінструменти, гучна музика
• 120+: Больовий поріг, ризик пошкодження слуху</string>
